original_description: a person squats down then jumps.
swapped_description: a person jumps then squats down.

original_description: a person is walking and then steps over something.
swapped_description: a person steps over something and then walks.

original_description: a person does a squat and raises both arms over its head.
swapped_description: a person raises both arms over its head and does a squat.

original_description: a man waves his hands then stands on his right leg while lifting his left.
swapped_description: a man stands on his right leg while lifting his left then waves his hands.

original_description: a person standing raises their arm in a drinking motion and then bends over.
swapped_description: a person bends over and then standing raises their arm in a drinking motion.

original_description: a person sways left and shakes their right hip, then sways right and shakes their left hip.
swapped_description: a person sways right and shakes their left hip, then sways left and shakes their right hip.

original_description: a person runs and jumps forward.
swapped_description: a person jumps and runs forward.

original_description: person is boxing, they throw an upper cut then defend and dodge then they throw a few right jabs.
swapped_description: person is boxing, they throw an upper cut then they throw a few right jabs then defend and dodge.

original_description: a person punches with their right hand before they do a counterclockwise spin.
swapped_description: a person does a counterclockwise spin before they punch with their right hand.

original_description: person walks up and then looks around behind him like someone is watching him.
swapped_description: person looks around behind him like someone is watching him and then walks up.
